item.title: Buying a New Notebook
item.description: Must have 16GB DDR4/DDR5 RAM AMD Ryzen 5/7 Preferable nice looks Comparison with my current laptop model Dell Latitude model x model y CPU Intel i5 2520M (4x2,5GHz) x x RAM DDR3 (2x4GB-1,3MHz) x x Disk SSD (128GB) x x Display 13,3’ LCD x x

item.title: How to Use Obsidian
item.description: Obsidian Knowledge base software based on linkable plain text md (=markdown) files. My personal usage guidelines write everything in english Used plugins Markdown and Obsidian syntax Markdown syntax cheat-sheet .

item.title: How to Write Book Summary
item.description: The Goal The goal of my personal book summary is to connect and embed the thoughts presented in the book into my personal active knowledge.
